title: macOS App Permissions & Security
description: Fix 'App cannot be opened' and camera/microphone/disk access issues on macOS.
keywords: cannot be opened because it is from an unidentified developer

steps.title: Allow Unidentified Apps
steps.instruction: System Settings → Privacy & Security → Scroll to 'Security' section → Click 'Open Anyway' for the blocked app.

steps.title: Reset Camera/Mic Permissions
steps.instruction: System Settings → Privacy & Security → Microphone/Camera. Toggle the switch off and on for the specific app (like Slack or Zoom).

steps.title: Grant Full Disk Access
steps.instruction: System Settings → Privacy & Security → Full Disk Access → Click '+' and add apps like Terminal or Backup tools if they can't see files.

steps.title: Manual Gatekeeper Bypass
steps.instruction: Open Terminal and run: 'sudo xattr -rd com.apple.quarantine /Applications/AppName.app'. This manually clears the 'quarantine' flag.

steps.title: Check Screen Recording
steps.instruction: For screen sharing issues: System Settings → Privacy & Security → Screen Recording. Ensure your communication app is authorized.
